statements: SELECT * FROM policy_documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT document_name, revision_number FROM policy_documents WHERE revision_number > 2;
SELECT document_name, document_content FROM policy_documents WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_name, updated_at FROM policy_documents WHERE document_name LIKE 'Privacy%';
SELECT * FROM policy_documents ORDER BY revision_number ASC, document_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents WHERE revision_number > 5 ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_name, created_at FROM policy_documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT document_id, document_name, document_content FROM policy_documents WHERE document_content LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY document_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents WHERE updated_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT document_id, revision_number, created_at FROM policy_documents WHERE revision_number BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM policies;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM policies WHERE policy_name = 'Health Insurance';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, created_at FROM policies ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_content FROM policies WHERE created_at >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT pr.policy_id, pr.revision_number, pr.revision_content FROM policy_revisions pr JOIN policies p ON pr.policy_id = p.policy_id WHERE p.policy_name LIKE '%Insurance%';
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_name = 'Car Insurance'
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM policies WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT policy_id, revision_number, revision_content FROM policy_revisions WHERE policy_id = '1001'
SELECT policy_id, created_at FROM policies ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, MAX(revision_number) AS latest_revision FROM policy_revisions GROUP BY policy_id
SELECT * FROM policy_documents
SELECT title, content FROM policy_documents WHERE id = 1
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM document_authors ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT revision_number, content FROM policy_revisions WHERE document_id = 2
SELECT id, title, version FROM policy_documents
SELECT * FROM policy_documents;
SELECT title, content FROM policy_documents WHERE version > 2 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT pd.title, pr.revision_number, da.author_name FROM policy_documents pd JOIN policy_revisions pr ON pd.id = pr.document_id JOIN document_authors da ON pd.id = da.document_id;
SELECT DISTINCT author_email FROM document_authors WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY author_email ASC;

SELECT pd.title, COUNT(pr.id) AS revision_count FROM policy_documents pd LEFT JOIN policy_revisions pr ON pd.id = pr.document_id GROUP BY pd.title HAVING revision_count > 2 ORDER BY revision_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM policy_documents WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, content, created_at FROM policy_documents ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT document_id, can_view, can_edit FROM user_permissions WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, created_at FROM policy_documents WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT users.username, policy_documents.title FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.id = user_permissions.user_id JOIN policy_documents ON user_permissions.document_id = policy_documents.id;
SELECT document_id, count(*) FROM user_permissions GROUP BY document_id;
SELECT policy_documents.title, users.username FROM policy_documents, users, user_permissions WHERE policy_documents.id = user_permissions.document_id AND users.id = user_permissions.user_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents;
SELECT document_name, created_by, created_at FROM policy_documents WHERE created_by = 'Admin';
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM policy_documents WHERE document_id = '6b44797e-5e09-4f25-a792-f95a1cc09080';
SELECT * FROM policy_revisions ORDER BY revised_at DESC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id INNER JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents;
SELECT document_name, created_by FROM policy_documents WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT document_id, document_name, created_by, created_at FROM policy_documents WHERE created_by LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT r.document_id, r.revision_number, r.revised_by, d.document_name FROM policy_revisions r JOIN policy_documents d ON r.document_id = d.document_id;
SELECT u.username, u.email, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
